code: @Test public void testResponse() throws Exception {     Object out = template.requestBody("netty4:tcp://localhost:{{port}}", "Copenhagen").     assertEquals("Hello Claus", out). }

@Test public void testNoResponse() throws Exception {     try {         template.requestBody("netty4:tcp://localhost:{{port}}", "London").         fail("Should throw an exception").     } catch (RuntimeCamelException e) {         assertTrue(e.getCause().getMessage().startsWith("No response")).     } }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() throws Exception {             from("netty4:tcp://localhost:{{port}}").choice().when(body().isEqualTo("Copenhagen")).transform(constant("Hello Claus")).otherwise().transform(constant(null)).         }     }. }
